name: Feed The Saad - BETA
description:
WASD to move

Spacebar to jump

Left click to shoot

Scroll Wheel to change weapon

+ - to increase/decrease sensitivity

Alt + f4 to exit the game

game is in development full version will be out soon

WARNING: Game may be a little loud so go to a low volume before starting the game, please tell me how much I need to change the volume

ok bye lol
